name: Take a break (Gold356)
description:
Controls:

  • Move with the arrow keys
  • Jump with z
  • Accelerate with x

Take a break is a mix between a racing and a platformer game in which you have to reach the flag before your opponent, avoid obstacles or use them as tools to go quicker. 

Also remember that your character will be exhausted if it is always moving, so take a break when needed.

This game was made for the Mini Jam 87, with Break as the theme, and pacifist as the limitation.

You can speedrun the game and submit your run here:

https://www.speedrun.com/tab
